MainInfo.headerDescription1: Great Limbus Library is a fan site and database developed by the community, dedicated to Limbus Company.
MainInfo.headerDescription2: If You want to keep up with the news about site updates, You can go to the
MainInfo.headerDescription4: section and go from there to Boosty, the latest news is published there for free.

NavigationSection.statuses: Information about buffs, debuffs and other statuses
NavigationSection.tierlist: Tier lists of Identities and EGOs

EventsSection.startDateUnknown: The starting date of the event is unknown
EventsSection.endDateUnknown: The event has started. The ending date is unknown

ToDoSection.3: General improvements to the site's interface and content
ToDoSection.contactUs: If you have ideas or suggestions, please click on the
ToDoSection.contactUs3: section and fill out the 'Full questionnaire on Great Limbus Library'.

TierListPage.title: Tier List
TierListPage.description: Only the tier of Identities/EGO matters. Within tiers, the position of Identities/EGO is NOT a ranking of strength.

identities.SSS: The strongest identities, with a wide range of usage and performing well in most situations
identities.SS: Very strong identities, with uncomplicated conditions for realization, but with potential/universality less than that of the SSS tier identities
identities.S: Strong identities that require a lot of conditions for their realization
identities.A: Average in strength identities. Not bad, but not something outstanding
identities.B: The level of strength of these identities is below average, they are easily replaced and rarely used
identities.C: Weak identities unable to deal effectively with the game content

ego.SSS: The strongest and most versatile EGOs, used effectively in the vast majority of situations
ego.SS: Very strong EGOs with a limited range of uses
ego.S: Strong EGOs used in rare or specific situations or not powerful enough for SS range
ego.A: Medium strong EGOs that are rarely used and are often replaced by their counterparts
ego.B: Mediocre EGOs that are rarely used and do little work
ego.C: Weak EGOs unable to compete with their counterparts

Filters.empty: The list is empty, but you can fix it by clearing some of the filters

TbTags.empty: The list of statuses is empty, add Identity or EGO to any slot

TbListIds.empty: No available Identities. Try disabling some filters.

AboutGamePage.title: About the Game

text.1: incorporates a variety of gameplay mechanics, ranging from turn-based combat to collecting, management, and roguelike elements. The game was developed and published by a South Korean indie studio.
text.2: The game was released worldwide on February 26, 2023. The events of the game take place in a dystopian, hypercapitalistic world known as 'the City', where the events of previous works by 'Project Moon' also unfold, namely: Lobotomy Corporation, Library of Ruina, webcomic Leviathan, and novel Distortion Detective. The game's action takes place some time after the events of all these stories. The game features Gacha elements, allowing players to spend real money to acquire Lunacy (in-game currency) or tickets used to acquire new Sinners' Identities or E.G.O. The in-game story is presented through a visual novel, as in the two predecessor games.

GraditudePage.title: Graditudes

text-donation.text1: Our project needs Your support to expand its functionality.
text-donation.text2: The Boosty platform is available for donations. This platform is widely used in our country and is not particularly widespread abroad. If you are not familiar with it, we hasten to reassure you, registration on it is possible using a Google account. The Boosty sets a goal, for which fundraising is ongoing right now.
text-donation.text3: Maecenas are people who supported our project during its most difficult time, when it most needed outside help.
